mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COUPON (coupon_code, description, coupon_type, discount_amount, discount_percentage, minimum_order_amount, expiry_date, is_active, created_at) VALUES (#{couponCode}, #{description}, #{couponType}, #{discountAmount}, #{discountPercentage}, #{minimumOrderAmount}, #{expiryDate}, #{isActive}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT coupon_id AS couponId, coupon_code AS couponCode, description, coupon_type AS couponType, discount_amount AS discountAmount, discount_percentage AS discountPercentage, minimum_order_amount AS minimumOrderAmount, expiry_date AS expiryDate, is_active AS isActive, created_at AS createdAt FROM COUPON ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT coupon_id AS couponId, coupon_code AS couponCode, description, coupon_type AS couponType, discount_amount AS discountAmount, discount_percentage AS discountPercentage, minimum_order_amount AS minimumOrderAmount, expiry_date AS expiryDate, is_active AS isActive, created_at AS createdAt FROM COUPON WHERE coupon_id = #{couponId}
mapper.update: UPDATE COUPON SET coupon_code = #{couponCode}, description = #{description}, coupon_type = #{couponType}, discount_amount = #{discountAmount}, discount_percentage = #{discountPercentage}, minimum_order_amount = #{minimumOrderAmount}, expiry_date = #{expiryDate}, is_active = #{isActive} WHERE coupon_id = #{couponId}
